hero.title: Cybersecurity Researcher

hero.description: a 24 year old Junior Cybersecurity Researcher in search for an internship around Metro Manila.

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Security is not a product, but a process.
quotes.author: Bruce Schneier

quotes.text: There are only two types of companies: those that have been hacked, and those that will be.
quotes.author: Robert Mueller

quotes.text: The quieter you become, the more you are able to hear.
quotes.author: Kali Linux
